shoulder-bash.name: Shoulder Bash
shoulder-bash.result: _Enemy and obstacle only_. The target takes **a hit** and is pushed 2" directly away.

precise-strike.name: Precise Strike
precise-strike.result: _Overcharge 1_. Chose a system except torso. Target takes **two hits** on chosen system.

inertia-dischargers.name: Inertia Dischargers
inertia-dischargers.desc: When resolving a free action generated by an assault action, this mech receives **+1 value** to the action flip.

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
juggernaut.desc: When this mech performs a **slam** or a **ram** action, it receives **+2 value** to the action flips. In adition, targets of **ram** actions are pushed an extra **+2"** away.
